evidence.text: LAWRENCE: His Eminence will require toiletries, some clean clothes, and choir dress of course. Monsignor O’Malley will look after you. Looking suddenly exhausted, Benitez follows O’Malley out of the office. Lawrence glances at Bellini, a little puzzled by his friend’s faint hostility. Bellini shrugs, as if a little puzzled himself.
